events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match what I originally purchased.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to receiving an incorrect product instead of their original purchase.
Assigning the refund request to the refunds specialist team for further assistance and processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is a photo of the item I received and my order number 123456. I hope this helps you to confirm the mistake quickly.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a return shipping label within the next 24 hours.
Thank you for the prompt response and for arranging the refund. I appreciate the quick handling of my issue.
We have now processed your refund and emailed you the return instructions. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please reach out if anything else is needed.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to help us improve our support. Your feedback is very important to us.
